Token.Abstract: The UHNRACPControllerDelegate protocol defines the methods that a delegate of a UHNRACPController object must adopt. The optional methods of the protocol allow the delegate to be notified upon completion of RACP operations.
Notifies the delegate after a successful RACP operation

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNRACPController that initiated the RACP operation, which could be any of a number of different controller types, hence its type is 'id'

Parameter.Name: enabled
Parameter.Abstract: The state that the RACP notification was set to

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate after a successful RACP operation

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNRACPController that initiated the RACP operation, which could be any of a number of different controller types, hence its type is 'id'

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate after a failed RACP operation

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNRACPController that initiated the RACP operation, which could be any of a number of different controller types, hence its type is 'id'

Parameter.Name: responseCode
Parameter.Abstract: The responseCode of the characteristic after the failed operation
